Name: Psychiatrist Simulator
About the game: Have you ever wanted to be a psychiatrist? Now you can! Be a shrink for 14 days. Meet 14 patients with unique stories of their lives. Help them with their problems, give them medication, say good word to them or lock them in mental hospital. The choice is yours. Diagnosis, treatment, chosen dialogues have impact on history of patients, so make your choices wisely. There are three patients each day, so there are total 42 visits. Nearly 5 hours of possible dialogues with unique characters. Patients have animated faces that express their emotions. Want to see Lukas Eathrabari nightmares in game? Play Nightmare Simulator.
